name: Endless Ninjas
description:
May take a while to load first time

An endless wave of ninjas attacks, survive as long as you can.

will you survive to fight the golden ninja?

Block Left - A / Larrow / left stickL

Block Right - D / R arrow / leftstickR

Block Up - W / Up arrow/ leftstickUp 

Attack - Left click / pad r1 

Dodge - Right Click, space,  ctrl, pad east face button 

can be played with controller
